explains: adj. 不健康的；危险的；有害身心健康的

sentences.en: His eyeballs were an unhealthy yellow.
sentences.cn: 他的眼球是不健康的蜡黄色。

sentences.en: His skin had an unhealthy greyish tinge.
sentences.cn: 他的皮肤有些许不健康的淡灰色。

sentences.en: An unhealthy diet will nullify the effects of training.
sentences.cn: 不健康的饮食会抵消锻炼的效果。
